main event: An unidentified elliptical-shaped object was sighted over Silver Springs, Maryland on 30 September 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 20 seconds by two different witnesses in different locations., The object was described as having a silvery color and looked like a very bright light at night., One witness noted it hovered at about 300 feet high and appeared to glide across the sky., Observers indicated the object was not moving fast enough to be a meteor., No photographs were confirmed as part of the report.
